text: Lia Emele Finocchiaro (; born 20 September 1984) is an Australian politician who is currently serving as the 14th Chief Minister of the Northern Territory. She has served as the leader of the Country Liberal Party (CLP) since 2020. She was the member for Drysdale from 2012 until 2016, when she was elected to the seat of Spillett. She became Chief Minister after leading the CLP to a landslide victory at the 2024 general election. ==References== Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Northern Territory) Category:Chief Ministers of the Northern Territory
title: Lia Finocchiaro
